channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for HI
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for HI

item.title: Report X-2022091378
item.description:
Report X-2022091378

Identified by scraper @ 2023-04-18T21:09:24+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2022-09-20
  • City: HONOLULU
  • State: HI
  • Report Type: Undeclared Shipment with no Release
  • Mode Of Transportation: Air
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE CO.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: RESPONDED TO A PACKAGE THAT NEEDED TO BE REWRAPPED. UPON INSPECTION OF THE CONTENTS DISCOVERED APPROXIMATELY 200 UNFORGETTABLE LITES FIREWORKS. THERE ARE NO DANGEROUS GOODS MARKS OR LABELS ON THE OUTER BOX.

item.title: Report I-2022110188
item.description:
Report I-2022110188

Identified by scraper @ 2023-04-18T21:09:24+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2022-07-12
  • City: Honolulu
  • State: HI
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Air
  • Carrier/Reporter: FEDERAL EXPRESS CORPORATION
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: DURING THE PM SORT OPERATIONS AT THE FEDEX EXPRESS SORT FACILITY IN HONOLULU, HI A FIBERBOARD BOX OBSERVED LEAKING. FURTHE INVESTIGATION INDICATED THE BOX CONTAINED ASSORTED ITEMS OF ID8000 CONSUMER COMMODITY, WHICH LEAKED INTO THE OUTER PACKAGING. FOLLOWING THE SPILL CLEANUP THE PACKAGE WAS PLACED INSIDE A SALVAGE DRUM AND HELD PENDING FURTHER DISPOSITION.

item.title: Report I-2022110023
item.description:
Report I-2022110023

Identified by scraper @ 2023-04-18T21:09:24+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2022-07-22
  • City: Kailua Kona
  • State: HI
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Air
  • Carrier/Reporter: FEDERAL EXPRESS CORPORATION
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: On 07/27/2022 at approximately 1330, Dangerous Goods Administration received a call from Employee 227326, reporting an adhesives spill. The shipment consisted of one plastic pail inside of a fiberboard box. The box was observed leaking. Further examination reveal that the inner pail appeared cracked, the cause was unknown. The shipment was held for pick-up by the recipient.

item.title: Report X-2022080192
item.description:
Report X-2022080192

Identified by scraper @ 2023-04-18T21:09:24+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2022-07-18
  • City: HONOLULU
  • State: HI
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Air
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE CO.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: RESPONDED TO A LEAKING DECLARED HAZARDOUS MATERIALS PACKAGE WITH DANGEROUS GOODS PAPERWORK. THE PACKAGE WAS MARKED AS UN1950 AEROSOLS, FLAMMABLE WITH A FLAMMABLE GAS DIAMOND AND AIR LTD QTY MARKING. THE PACKAGE HAD SUCCESSFULLY PASSED AN ACCEPTANCE AUDIT AT THE ORIGIN. UPON ARRIVAL AT THE UPS FACILITY IN HAWAII, THE OUTER BOX WAS VISIBLY SOILED. UPON INSPECTION OF THE CONTENTS DISCOVERED SOILED INNER BOXES ALSO. THERE ARE TWO INNER BOXES EACH CONTAINING (12) AEROSOL CANS OF SO SURE CORROSION PREVENTATIVE COMPOUND, TOTAL (24) CANS. ONE CAN WAS MISSING THE CAP AND HAD LEAKED THE ENTIRE CONTENTS FROM THE NOZZLE OF THE ONE CAN. THE REMAINING AEROSOL CANS ARE INTACT.
